item.title: Writing workflow: Pandoc scripts
item.description: tl;dr I uploaded my Pandoc workflow to GitHub, feel free to use it Having an unobtrusive workflow is important. There are things about writing that just take too much time when done by hand. Text formatting and file converting are two that I especially hate. People expect different things. Some want .docx, others .tex or .pdfs, all complying with a set of strict formatting rules. Often enough a faithful conversion of .
